member.name: M:TopCore.WebAPI.Startup.ConfigureServices(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: This method gets called by the runtime. Use this method to add services to the container.

member.name: M:TopCore.WebAPI.Startup.SetupLogFactory(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILoggerFactory)
